name: Question about move
question: Imagine that Karel is in the 5x5 empty world, on the (3,2) corner, facing west. And we commanded to `move`. On what corner will it end up?

name: Question about turnLeft
question: Imagine that Karel is in the 5x5 empty world, on the (3,2) corner, facing west. And we commanded to `turnLeft`. What direction will it face?

name: Question about putBeeper
question: Imagine that Karel is in the 5x5 empty world, on the (3,2) corner, facing west. And we commanded to `putBeeper`. On what corner will beeper appear?
